description:
I downloaded an equivalent tab from Ultimate guitar which I modified with a tab given by a previous Satyricon session guitarist (Gildas Le Pape) that you can find here : 
https://www.onlinegitar.no/tema/?tema=3

The original tab was great for the drums so I just changed the guitar parts and now it's perfect. Thanks to Antherion for the original tab, and to Gildas to share.
title: K.I.N.G.
